attributes.action: make law that all council or housing association houses be fitted with thermostatic mixing valves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more than 450 children a year are injured or even killed because the hot water our homes are far to hot. My daughter died because our water was scalding when she accidentaly climb into the bath behind her mums back, she was just 18 months. I don't want to see this happen to other parents. The mixing valves are law in residental care homes and even hospitals so lets make it law in all council/ housing association houses.
